dict.string:
This is a folder used by Keyboard Maestro subroutine: 𝗌.𝗳𝗻𝗱⇾CreateNewFolderOrFile
* It can include template files and folders.
* Template files can be blank or include content.
* Template folders can include files and/or folders. When folder templates are used, the enclosed files and folders will be copied as is.
* There is no need to create these templates: 1) empty folder, 2) empty TXT file, or 3) empty MD file.
* Template files and folders will be presented alphabetically. ➜ and ⇨ prefixes can used in template names to force them to the top of the sort.
* Files and folders with names that begin with hash (#) will be ignored.
* Two or more consecutive underscores must not be used in template names.
Note: This subroutine is used by a macro named 'Finder Assistant'. It is available on the Keyboard Maestro forum: https://forum.keyboardmaestro.com
Convert Template Files to a Menu List

dict.string: #!/bin/bash PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin cd "$KMVAR_local__TemplatesPath" ls -1 | sed 's/\/$//' | sed '/^#/d' | sort -f -d | tr '\n' '|' | sed 's/|$//'

⚉ Target Folder: %Variable%local_Path_Label%
Create a new empty 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿, 𝘁𝘅𝘁 File, or 𝗺𝗱 File. Alternatively, create a new 𝗧𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗖𝗹𝗼𝗻𝗲, i.e., a file or folder–with enclosed files and/or folders. The 𝗧𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 can be opened using ⌘𝗢.
👉🏿 If the 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 or 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 already exists, the created folder/file name will incude a sufflix based on the values supplied below.
👉🏿 Templates Folder: %Variable%local_TemplatesPath_Label%
👉🏿 The buttons can be selected with the keyboard using ⎋, ⌘𝗢, ⌘𝗖, ⌘𝗠, ⌘𝗧 or ⌘𝗙. %Variable%local_InvisibleChar%

⚉ Target Folder: %Variable%local_Path_Label%
Create a new empty 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿, 𝘁𝘅𝘁 File, or 𝗺𝗱 File. Alternatively, the 𝗧𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 can be opened using ⌘𝗢.
👉🏿 If the 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗙𝗼𝗹𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 or 𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗲 𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 already exists, the created folder/file name will incude a sufflix based on the values supplied below.
👉🏿 File and Folder Templates can be used, but the Template Folder is currently empty.
👉🏿 Templates Folder: %Variable%local_TemplatesPath_Label%
👉🏿 The buttons can be selected with the keyboard using ⎋, ⌘𝗢, ⌘𝗠, ⌘𝗧 or ⌘𝗙. %Variable%local_InvisibleChar%
